name: Warzone VR
detailed_description:
The official gameplay trailer is coming soon, pre-launch!

Warzone VR is a cross-platform multiplayer virtual reality shooter. Group up with other players and enter a battlefield where real players take part in a massive struggle for dominance. With dedicated servers to support a smooth and competitive experience, Warzone VR was developed from the ground up with cross-platform in mind.

FEATURES:
  • Progression System
  • Customization
  • Vehicles
  • Large Maps
  • Competitive Play
  • Tournaments
  • Free DLC Roadmap

short_description: Warzone VR is a cross-platform multiplayer virtual reality shooter. Player progression, customizable weapons and armor, vehicles, large battlefields and dedicated servers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5-4590 Equivalent or Greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Equivalent or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

legal_notice: Sinn Studio Inc. © 2017-2018. All Rights Reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: Warzone VR features excessive war violence in a realistic setting and is not suitable for all ages.
